videoDetails.Title: War Thunder Ground Forces  Realistic Tank Battles
videoDetails.Description:
War Thunder is a WW2 themed historical tanks/planes/ships pvp combat game with various game modes. Here we're looking at the War Thunder Ground Forces - tanks and anti-aircraft vehicles - and playing in Realistic Battles where the game gives you a very realistic and challenging tank warfare experience. But I feel its the best way to play War Thunder.

More War Thunder videos ► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHhGmXzpk3Y&list=PLngtjbKGsqyFvmZplBm6VaFw9VxM2b18u
